description:
Historic luxury hotel 1 km from the Louvre Museum

North of Tuileries Garden
This luxurious and historic hotel puts you in Paris's 9th arrondissement, a 10-minute walk from Tuileries Garden and 1 km from the Louvre Museum. You can jump on the subway 2 blocks away at Opra Metro Station.

A premier neighborhood
There is an abundance of shopping and dining opportunities in the neigborhood surrounding the Intercontinental Paris Le Grand. If you're looking for upmarket brands, you can walk 5 blocks south and explore the luxury shops that line Place Vendme.

A glimpse of history
The hotel has some of the most impressive interior spaces in Paris, including the Verrire restaurant under a 800 sq feet glass roof. Its Caf de la Paix has been open for over 150 years and is a national heritage site. Contemporary flourishes include a 24-hour gym and a spa. Free WiFi is available in public areas.

Modern touches
The neoclassic Empire-style decor of the rooms reflects the fact that the hotel dates back to 1862. Wired Internet access and satellite TV remind you that you're in the 21st century.

DESCRIPTION.value:
Historic luxury hotel 1 km from the Louvre Museum

North of Tuileries Garden
This luxurious and historic hotel puts you in Paris's 9th arrondissement, a 10-minute walk from Tuileries Garden and 1 km from the Louvre Museum. You can jump on the subway 2 blocks away at Opra Metro Station.

A premier neighborhood
There is an abundance of shopping and dining opportunities in the neigborhood surrounding the Intercontinental Paris Le Grand. If you're looking for upmarket brands, you can walk 5 blocks south and explore the luxury shops that line Place Vendme.

A glimpse of history
The hotel has some of the most impressive interior spaces in Paris, including the Verrire restaurant under a 800 sq feet glass roof. Its Caf de la Paix has been open for over 150 years and is a national heritage site. Contemporary flourishes include a 24-hour gym and a spa. Free WiFi is available in public areas.

Modern touches
The neoclassic Empire-style decor of the rooms reflects the fact that the hotel dates back to 1862. Wired Internet access and satellite TV remind you that you're in the 21st century.

HOTEL_AMENITY.value:
The InterContinental Paris Le Grand is a registered French Historic Monument and the Empire-style hotel has a full-service spa and 24-hour fitness center. Guests can enjoy views of Opera Square along with classic French cuisine at Caf de la Paix, have a leisurely breakfast or lunch at La Verrire, and sip cocktails at Le Bar.

A business center is staffed during the day and free wired and wireless Internet access is available in public areas. Other facilities include a meeting/conference room, ballroom, event catering, spa services, and secretarial services. Valet parking is also available (surcharge).

DINING.value:
Caf de la Paix - Opened in 1862, the restaurant features opulent gilding and ceiling frescos that were recently refurbished. Classic French cuisine is served for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. The outdoor terrace faces Opera Square.

La Verrire - Continental breakfast and a la carte lunch menu are served under a glass ceiling in an elegant garden setting.

Le Bar - Cocktails and light fare are offered in an English-style pub setting.

RECREATION.value:
The 24-hour fitness center has cardio and weight machines, and personal training is available. Close by is a jogging trail through the Tuileries Gardens.

The recreational activities listed below are available either on site or nearby; fees may apply.

CHECK_IN_POLICY.value:
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Paris Opera - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Paris Olympia - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Pinacotheque de Paris - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Galeries Lafayette - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi

Place de la Concorde - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi

Folies Bergere - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi

The closest major airports to InterContinental Paris le Grand are:
Paris (ORY-Orly) - 16.1 km / 10 mi
Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle) - 23 km / 14.3 mi

The preferred airport for InterContinental Paris le Grand is Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle).

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 km and mile.

HCOM_SPA.value: I-Spa by Algotherm uses marine ingredients in treatments that include body wraps, facials, and massages. The full-service spa has a couple's suite, dry sauna, herbal area, and fruit juice bar.

LOCATION_TEASER.value:
Center of Paris
In the 9th district at the center of Paris, the Empire-style hotel faces the Opra Garnier and is steps from the Opera metro station. The Louvre Museum and Place Vendme are within 1 km of the hotel.

AWARDS_AND_AFFILIATIONS.value:
Green / Sustainable Property
This property participates in Green Globe, a program that measures the property's impact on one or more of the following: environment, community, cultural-heritage, the local economy.

NATIONAL_RATING.value: This hotel has received its official star rating from the French Tourism Development Agency, ATOUT France.

KNOW_BEFORE_YOU_GO.value: • The property has connecting/adjoining rooms, which are subject to availability and can be requested by contacting the property using the number on the booking confirmation.

FEES.value:
The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.


  • Breakfast fee: EUR 45 per person (approximately)
  • Valet parking fee: EUR 40 per day

The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

MANDATORY_HOTEL_IMPOSED_FEES.value:
You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the hotel:


  • Deposit: EUR 2.48 per night
  • A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 2.48 per person, per night

We have included all charges provided to us by the property. However, charges can vary, for example, based on length of stay or the room you book.

ACCESSIBILITY_OPTION.value: To make requests for specific accessibility needs, complete the "Special or Accessibility Requests" section of "Trip Preferences" when you book your hotel.

TAGLINE.value: 4-star hotel with spa, near Paris Opera

INTERNET.value:
Rooms
Free WiFi and free wired Internet access

Public areas
Free WiFi

• Credit card or cash deposit required

  • Government-issued photo ID required

HCOM_INTERNET_AT_A_GLANCE.value:
• Free WiFi in public areas

  • Free WiFi and wired Internet access in rooms

HCOM_DINING.value:
Caf de la Paix - This fine-dining restaurant serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

La Verrire - This restaurant serves breakfast and lunch.

HCOM_FACILITY_POLICIES.value: The property has connecting/adjoining rooms, which are subject to availability and can be requested by contacting the property using the number on the booking confirmation.

HCOM_MANDATORY_TAXES.value: • A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 2.48 per person, per night

HCOM_FEES_DINING.value: Breakfast is offered for an extra charge of EUR 45 per person (approximately)

HCOM_FEES_TRAVELING_WITH_KIDS.value: Babysitting/childcare is available for an extra charge

GOLD.value: This upmarket hotel puts you in the glamour of Paris's 9th arrondissement, 1 km away from Tuileries Garden and the Louvre Museum. The hotel's ornate Empire-style decor gives you a taste of 19th century Parisian elegance, and Caf de la Paix is a national heritage site dating back to 1862. The Opra Metro Station is only 2 blocks away, giving you easy access to the rest of Paris.

GUESTS_LOVE.value:
Guests Love
  • Great location

  • Wonderful architecture and heritage status

  • Friendly staff

END_OF_THE_DAY.value:
At the end of the day
Our guests love the Intercontinental Paris Le Grand's convenient location near major tourist attractions. They also express a great appreciation for the hotel's history and elegant design.

HOTEL_FEATURE.value:
• 470 guestrooms
  • Restaurant and bar/lounge
  • Full-service spa
  • Breakfast available
  • Health club
  • Valet parking
  • Business center
  • Childcare
  • 24-hour front desk
  • Daily housekeeping
  • Car rentals on site
  • Front desk safe
  • Laundry service
  • Meeting room
  • Multilingual staff
  • Concierge services
  • Gift shops/newsstands
  • Luggage storage
  • Porter/bellhop

ROOM_FEATURE.value: InterContinental Paris le Grand offers a great location, putting you within just a 10-minute walk of Paris Opera and Galeries Lafayette. Guests can indulge in spa services at the spa, and Caf de la Paix serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. A bar/lounge and a health club are offered, and rooms at this upscale hotel get the details right with Egyptian cotton sheets and premium bedding.

LOCATION_SECTION.value:
• Heart of Paris
  • Paris Opera (0.1 mi / 0.2 km)
  • Galeries Lafayette (0.3 mi / 0.4 km)
  • Notre Dame Cathedral (1.8 mi / 2.9 km)
  • Arc de Triomphe (1.8 mi / 2.9 km)
  • Place de la Concorde (0.6 mi / 1 km)
